method.step: Wash the chickpeas. Soak them into water for 6 to 8 hours. Drain the water.
Put the chickpeas in pressure cooker pan. Add 3 cups of water. Add 0.5 spoon salt. Cook them into pressure cooker for 25-30 min (or for 6-7 whistles)
When the cooker cools down, drain the water from the chickpeas.
Heat the oil in frying pan. Add Mustard seeds. When Mustard seeds crackle add Asafoetida.
Add green chilli paste, ginger paste, bay leaves, cloves powder, cinnamon Powder, cashew nuts paste and poppy seeds. Heat it for about half a minute. Make sure you stir it at regular intervals
Add tomato puree and heat it for about 5-7 min on a medium flame.
Add the chickpeas, salt and turmeric powder. Stir it and let it simmer for about 5 min.
Garnish it with chopped coriander and the chole are ready to serve. (Can serve to about 3 people. Can be consumed with paratha or Jeera Rice.)
